version_description:
We've made a ton of improvements:
- better HDR (now HDR+!) and improved Strobe mode
- UI improvements and enhanced performance for a smoother workflow
- fixed minor bugs & crashes
- more help assets

This update we've added:
- 5 new preset packs! Check out Bright, Drama, Faded, HighCon and LowCon.
- HDR+ mode improvements
- full compatibility with iOS 11
- better performance on iPhone 6/6+
- bug fixes

User feedback is super important to us. Get in touch (quickshot.support@lightricks.com) and tell us what you think, we're all ears!

What's new:
- fixed saved presets deletion on iOS 11.
- fixed export to iCloud Photo Sharing.
- added flash control on Quickshot mode.
- improved performance.

User feedback is super important to us. Get in touch (quickshot.support@lightricks.com) and tell us what you think, we're all ears!

What has changed?? What hasn't?!?
- Introducing Primers: Intense, bold, image enhancing deep filters fine-tuned for adventure junkies who live life in full color.
- Sky Control: Transform the sky in seconds! Chose from a mix of skies covering breathtaking dawn hues, midday energy, vivid sunsets and desert nights. Colorize and add clouds or move them to suggest a breeze.
- New slick UI.
- iPhone X support.
- Performance optimizations.

What has changed?? What hasn't?!? Here are some key features:
- Introducing Primers: Intense, bold, image enhancing deep filters fine-tuned for adventure junkies who live life in full color. These Primers will transform any landscape photo to a poster-worthy shot.
- Sky Control: Transform the sky in seconds! Add details to your sky with a simple slider, or chose from a mix of skies covering breathtaking dawn hues, midday energy, vivid sunsets and desert nights. Colorize and add clouds or move them to suggest a breeze.
- New slick UI for an even better editing experience, including haptic feedback.
- More help videos.
- Long press undo button to reset.
- iPhone X support.
- Performance optimizations.

- Improved Sky feature.
- Added grain tool (in Details).
- Bug fixes and improved performance.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

We would love to hear from you, If you'd like our help with any issues, please contact us at quickshot.support@lightricks.com.
~ Quickshot Team ~

By popular demand, we've added more overlays:
- New Year Overlays Pack! Celebrate the year of the pig with these festive Overlays.
- More lens flares!
Additionally, we fixed some bugs.

We would love to hear from you, If you'd like our help with any issues, please contact us at quickshot.support@lightricks.com.


- Quickshot Team.

— Bug fixes and performance improvements.

We would love to hear from you, If you'd like our help with any issues, please contact us at quickshot.support@lightricks.com.
~ Quickshot Team ~
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Due to popular demand, we have added localization!

What's new?
- As requested from our users: the app is now iPad supported!!
- Full app localization.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
This version is a hotfix for a bug which caused the app to freeze when loading photos on certain devices.

After all the love and positive feedback we got for our Sky feature, we decided to give some love back to the users:
We took our Sky tool to a whole new level! From sunny skies to dreamy sunsets and beautiful nights, we give you the ultimate tool to give your photo that same feeling you had when you captured it.

Every sky is adjustable, and you can randomize it until you create your favorite sky! Make sure to check out the advanced tools each sky has to offer (like Randomize, Horizon, Feather etc.), by tapping on the selected sky again.

Let us know what you think!
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

We are excited to introduce our new "Portrait" feature! Now you can create professional looking portraits with a single tap.
Continuing the Quickshot tradition, this feature is:
A) Super easy to use.
B) Creates stunning results in a heart beat.
C) Fully adjustable for those who seek more control.

We worked very hard to bring you this feature and we can't wait to hear your feedback. Let us know what you think!
bug fixes and performance improvements.
Added a new screen that describes our weekly facebook challenge and offers the user to enter the challenge.

Following the success of the "Quickshot weekly challenge" on Facebook, we have added the weekly challenge to Instagram as well!
We hope you enjoy!

Quickshot Team.

Introducing a new package of skies: "Ablaze".
Set your skies on fire with this brand new package!

Our #1 requested feature: Brushes!
Use the new Brush and Eraser with the automatic Sky and Portrait features for even better results.
That's right, now you can adjust the Sky and Portrait effects with ease and get a perfect match in every photo!
Stop offering a subscription with a trial period.
This version contains different bug fixes.
Added Christmas sky assets.
This version includes different bug fixes.
This version includes different bug fixes.

TWO amazing features and an upgraded experience!

* Magic - Fix photos magically in just one tap. Magic automatically finds the best settings to fix every one of your photos!
* Overlay - Add stunning special effects. Overlay adds amazing effects such as light leaks, lens flare, bokeh, rain, snow, fireworks, particles etc. However, to keep it in the Quickshot spirit, the feature detects faces and skies to create the best possible blend to flatter every photo! Let's keep fireworks in the sky, and rain out of your face ;)
* Improved Import - We created a new import screen to provide you with a better experience and easier access to your sessions. Additionally, we added features such as the option to favorite or erase multiple photos at once!

We would love to get your feedback!

- Quickshot team.

TWO amazing features and an upgraded experience!
* Magic - Fix photos magically in just one tap. Magic automatically finds the best settings to fix every one of your photos!
* Overlay - Add stunning special effects. Overlay adds amazing effects such as light leaks, lens flare, bokeh, rain, snow, fireworks, particles etc. However, to keep it in the Quickshot spirit, the feature detects faces and skies to create the best possible blend to flatter every photo! Let's keep fireworks in the sky, and rain out of your face ;)
* Improved Import - We created a new import screen to provide you with a better experience and easier access to your sessions. Additionally, we added features such as the option to favorite or erase multiple photos at once!
* A few bug fixes.

We would love to get your feedback!

- Quickshot team.

By popular demand, we've added more overlays:
- New Year Overlays Pack! Celebrate the year of the pig with these festive Overlays.
- More lens flares!
Additionally, we fixed some bugs.

We would love to hear from you, If you'd like our help with any issues, please contact us at quickshot.support@lightricks.com.


- Quickshot Team.

- A widget to move, scale and rotate your overlays!
- An overlay pack for valentine's day Ɛ>
- More Skies!
- Fixed a bug which caused the Sky feature to malfunction on some devices.

We would love to hear from you, If you'd like our help with any issues, please contact us at quickshot.support@lightricks.com.

~ Quickshot Team ~

- A widget to move, scale and rotate your overlays!
- An overlay pack for valentine's day Ɛ>
- More Skies!
- Fixed a bug which caused the Sky feature to malfunction on some devices.
- Fixed a bug which sometimes caused the device to crash during export.
We would love to hear from you, If you'd like our help with any issues, please contact us at quickshot.support@lightricks.com.

~ Quickshot Team ~

A brand new feature (!!): Looks.
Looks are combinations of Quickshot tools, specially crafted by our design team.
With looks you can combine the power of all our tools in a single tap.
Each look is completely different, to allow you a wide range of edits, to match any scenario ;)
What else you may ask?
We also added more skies, more filters (look for the Tone pack!) and more overlays (Look for the Duo pack and more!) :)

We would love to hear from you, If you'd like our help with any issues, please contact us at quickshot.support@lightricks.com.
~ Quickshot Team ~

— Bug fixes and performance improvements.

We would love to hear from you, If you'd like our help with any issues, please contact us at quickshot.support@lightricks.com.
~ Quickshot Team ~

As usual, making Quickshot even faster & easier by shooing those bugs away and making the app (even) friendlier. Done using a tool? Tap the checkmark to stick to your edits, or the X to try something else.

We would love to hear from you, If you'd like our help with any issues, please contact us at quickshot.support@lightricks.com.
~ Quickshot Team ~

Squashed that bug some of you were experiencing when attempting to export your shots!
Huge thank you to those of you who helped our support team in solving the problem - you know who you are ;)

Yours,
The Quickshot Team

As usual, making Quickshot even faster & easier by shooing those bugs away!

Yours,
The Quickshot Team

Hey Quickshotters!
You asked for it, and it's here - create and save your own custom Looks.
So get in there and get editing - we can't wait to see more of your #HowIQuickshot moments, now with your own signature style.

Yours,
The Quickshot Team

You asked for it, and it's here - create and save your own custom Looks.
So get in there and get editing - we can't wait to see more of your #HowIQuickshot moments, now with your own signature style.

Yours,
The Quickshot Team

Adjust the mood of your shots in one tap with one of your 34 new Filters!
This version contains different bug fixes.
This update includes bug fixes and stability improvements.
This update includes bug fixes and stability improvements.
This update includes support for iOS 13, bug fixes and stability improvements.

Hey Quickshoters,
Excited about Fall? What better way to celebrate the season changing than with new skies to match the beautiful changing leaves!
With this update we've brought you:
- 12 new Skies
- 24 awesome new Effects
Enjoy the season!
Yours,

The Quickshot Team

Hey Quickshoters,
Excited about Fall? What better way to celebrate the season changing than with new skies to match the beautiful changing leaves!
With this update we've brought you:
- 12 new Skies
- 24 awesome new Effects

Other than that, we've added some bug fixes and stability improvements.
Enjoy the season!
Yours,

The Quickshot Team
Bug fixes and stability improvements.
Bug fixes and stability improvements.
Bug fixes and stability improvements.
Bug fixes and stability improvements.

Happy Holidays Quickshotters!

We're bringing you some surprises this holiday season.
First of all, we've added some wonderful Christmas & Holiday Overlays and Skies just for you, so get out there and make those holiday cards.
Secondly, we've added 50 new Looks(!!) and sorted them into 16 packs for your convenience :)

Cheers and enjoy the holidays,
The Quickshot Team

Happy Holidays Quickshotters!

We're bringing you some surprises this holiday season.
First of all, we've added some wonderful Christmas & Holiday Overlays and Skies just for you, so get out there and make those holiday cards.
Secondly, we've added 50 new Looks(!!) and sorted them into 16 packs for your convenience :)

Additionally, we added some performance improvements and bug fixes.

Cheers and enjoy the holidays,
The Quickshot Team

Hey there!
In addition to some bug squashing, we’re releasing a BRAND NEW feature for you - heal! Now you can go ahead and remove anything from a pesky spot to that random person photobombing your shot. We can’t wait to see what you’ll do with it.

Stay healthy and keep editing,
The Quickshot Team

Hi everyone!

Exciting news – we’re changing our name! From today, Quickshot will become “Lightleap.”
We hope you love the name as much as we do and continue to use it for your incredible creations. Can’t wait to see them!

Yours,

The Lightleap Team

We hope you love the name as much as we do and continue to use it for your incredible creations. Can’t wait to see them!

Hey Lightleapers,

Love our Sky tool? Well prepare to love it even more! We added a ton of new skies to provide you with the highest quality skies possible.
Apart from that we've made several "under the hood" adjustments to keep the app running super smooth and fast.
Got a feature request or just need a helping hand? Drop us a line at: lightleap.support@lightricks.com

Keep creating,
The Lightleap Team
